channel.title: DataVisualization on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] A network diagram was created with COVID-19 data.
item.description: ## Introduction Create a graph, network diagram, and data table based on the Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare COVID-19 infection status data and create a Web application. Did. The created app will be the one with the link below. App link: https://chomoku.herokuapp.com/covid-19 Below is the screen of the network diagram. < /a> The data used is obtained from the Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare website. Scraping is just using the pandas read_html function.

item.title: [Python] Is it the moon that triggered the huge earthquake? -> Monthly
item.description: ## 0. Abstract In many cases, huge earthquakes (M>8) are triggered by the deformation of the earth due to tidal stress caused by the moon. There were also some papers that treated the earthquakes that occurred in the past statistically and discussed the relationship with the tide. However, it goes without saying that even though we discussed the Tidal Phase Angle, we could not find anything that clearly showed Lunar Age or Lunar Phase.
